title: Awesome List Updates on Dec 18, 2023

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • autoenv (⭐5.9k) - Directory-based environments.

items.title: Awesome Playwright
items.content_text:
### Integrations

*   [Serenity/JS](https://serenity-js.org) - Acceptance testing, reporting, and test integration framework for Playwright, implementing the [Screenplay Pattern](https://serenity-js.org/handbook/design/screenplay-pattern/).

### Utils

*   [automated-Playwright-UI-tests](https://github.com/OctoMind-dev) - Auto-generated, run & maintained with AI-assisted test case discovery.

### Guides

*   [serenity-js.org](https://serenity-js.org/handbook/web-testing/your-first-web-scenario/) - Learn how to write acceptance tests in business language using Playwright and the Serenity/JS Screenplay Pattern.
items.content_html:
Integrations

  • Serenity/JS - Acceptance testing, reporting, and test integration framework for Playwright, implementing the Screenplay Pattern.

Utils

  • automated-Playwright-UI-tests - Auto-generated, run & maintained with AI-assisted test case discovery.

Guides

  • serenity-js.org - Learn how to write acceptance tests in business language using Playwright and the Serenity/JS Screenplay Pattern.

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Templates / Vue 3

*   [arco-admin (⭐169)](https://github.com/LIjiAngChen8/arco-admin) - `Vite` + `ArcoDesign` + `TypeScript` follows `ESM` standards, offering an out-of-the-box,standardized, feature-rich template for middle and back-office management systems.

### WordPress / Community

*   [Kima (⭐23)](https://github.com/axelilali/kima) - Starter theme with Twig.
items.content_html:

  • arco-admin (⭐169) - Vite + ArcoDesign + TypeScript follows ESM standards, offering an out-of-the-box,standardized, feature-rich template for middle and back-office management systems.

items.title: Awesome Ai4lam
items.content_text:
### Learning Resources / Generative AI

*   [The Map Of Transformers](https://towardsdatascience.com/the-map-of-transformers-e14952226398)
*   [The Illustrated Transformer](https://jalammar.github.io/illustrated-transformer/), a visual introduction to transformers
*   [Introduction to Generative AI](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/paths/118), by Google
*   [Generative AI for Beginners - A Course](https://microsoft.github.io/generative-ai-for-beginners/#/), by Microsoft
*   [A Generative AI Primer](https://nationalcentreforai.jiscinvolve.org/wp/2023/10/16/generative-ai-primer/), by the UK's National Centre for AI

### Learning Resources / AI in galleries, libraries, archives and museums

*   The [CENL "AI in Libraries" network group](https://www.cenl.org/networkgroups/ai-in-libraries-network-group/) is also organizing webinars on AI implementation in GLAM.
items.content_html:
Learning Resources / Generative AI

  • The Map Of Transformers
  • The Illustrated Transformer, a visual introduction to transformers
  • Introduction to Generative AI, by Google
  • Generative AI for Beginners - A Course, by Microsoft
  • A Generative AI Primer, by the UK's National Centre for AI

Learning Resources / AI in galleries, libraries, archives and museums

  • The CENL "AI in Libraries" network group is also organizing webinars on AI implementation in GLAM.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### File Explorer / Diagnostics

*   [rolv-apneseth/tfm.nvim (⭐93)](https://github.com/Rolv-Apneseth/tfm.nvim) - Similar to `fm-nvim`, this provides Neovim integration for several popular terminal file managers (including [yazi (⭐27k)](https://github.com/sxyazi/yazi)).

### Icon / Diagnostics

*   [2KAbhishek/nerdy.nvim (⭐290)](https://github.com/2KAbhishek/nerdy.nvim/) - Find and insert the latest nerd font glyphs.

### Utility / Diagnostics

*   [ragnarok22/whereami.nvim (⭐16)](https://github.com/ragnarok22/whereami.nvim) - Test your VPN by getting you current location.
*   [ariel-frischer/bmessages.nvim (⭐51)](https://github.com/ariel-frischer/bmessages.nvim) - Replace the default :messages window with a configurable, auto-updating buffer.

### Git / Diagnostics

*   [2KAbhishek/co-author.nvim (⭐30)](https://github.com/2KAbhishek/co-author.nvim) - Quickly add co-authors to commits.
items.content_html:
File Explorer / Diagnostics

  • rolv-apneseth/tfm.nvim (⭐93) - Similar to fm-nvim, this provides Neovim integration for several popular terminal file managers (including yazi (⭐27k)).

Icon / Diagnostics

  • 2KAbhishek/nerdy.nvim (⭐290) - Find and insert the latest nerd font glyphs.

Utility / Diagnostics

  • ragnarok22/whereami.nvim (⭐16) - Test your VPN by getting you current location.
  • ariel-frischer/bmessages.nvim (⭐51) - Replace the default :messages window with a configurable, auto-updating buffer.

Git / Diagnostics

  • 2KAbhishek/co-author.nvim (⭐30) - Quickly add co-authors to commits.

items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
